Description: Epiphone Les Paul Standard limited edition signed by Staind - extremely clean! You are viewing a 2001, made in Korea Epiphone Les Paul Standard limited edition. This guitar was signed by all the members of the rock band Staind. Included is a certificate of Authenticity. This was one of Epiphones higher valued instruments of the time. Guitar features a flamed maple top, stunning Blueburst finish, mahogany back and neck, rosewood, bound finger board with mother-of-pearl Trapezoid inlays, Gibson USA pickups, Epiphone-Bigsby style vibrato, Deluxe tuners and a Gator deluxe molded hard shell case.      Guitar is in near mint condition with only the slightest signs of handling. I don't believe the guitar was ever played. Easy 9 of 10 cosmetic condition. Signatures are clear and intact. The guitar will be set up for maximum playability in our shop before shipping. Whether you are a player, collector or just a super fan of the band Staind, this guitar has it all. There is probably not another one in existence so don't let it slip through your fingers and go to another bidder. The instrument pictured is the one you will receive. We use our own photos to ensure that you have a full view of the exact instrument you are purchasing. A case or a bag is available for an additional fee. Please contact us if you’re interested. PERRY'S PROFESSIONAL SETUP:This guitar has been professionally setup to play great!Guitars do not generally come from the factory setup, so this is a huge benefit for all players from beginning to professional, and in our opinion a must have! No professional player would use a guitar that hasn't been setup, nor should you!We normally charge $75 for this service, but for you this is a FREE BONUS included with every guitar we sell online!This includes truss rod adjustment, fret dressing, nut and saddle adjustment, and much more.**CLICK HERE FOR VIDEO** Listing and template services provided by inkFrog
Title: Epiphone Les Paul Standard limited edition signed by Staind - extremely clean!
